}, ]; const MovieDetail = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const movie = movies.find((m) => m.id === parseInt(id)); const [showBookingForm, setShowBookingForm] = useState(false); const handleBookTickets = () => { setShowBookingForm(true); }; return (

{movie.title}

⭐ {movie.rating}/10 ({movie.votes} Votes)

{movie.duration} • {movie.genre} • {movie.releaseDate}

Languages: {movie.languages}

About the movie

{movie.description}

{showBookingForm && ( setShowBookingForm(false)} movie={movie} /> )}
); }; export default MovieDetail;
